name: Compliment Generator (Leaf Let)
description:
Sit back and relax as compliments rain before your eyes.

This is a very small, very humble learning project and my first actual game, but I still hope you will enjoy playing it!

Game & Music by Leaf Let

The background is an asset by Trix (@Trixelized) 
The font used is an asset by Castpixel (@Castpixel)
